mapper.select: select * from kcd_gskh order by ctime desc
select * from kcd_gskh where name=#{0} and ncode=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into kcd_gskh ( id, name, address, ctime, utime, ncode, kd, qyname, qykhname, khrname , czrid, api_ckey )values( #{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{ctime}, #{utime}, #{ncode}, #{kd}, #{qyname}, #{qykhname}, #{khrname}, #{czrid}, #{api_ckey} )
